short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the status of every course's assignments on NTU COOL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By simply clicking a button on the side bar (or the icon in Extensions tab), You can view the status of every course's assignments on NTU COOL. See the usage tutorial in the settings.
